resources.string:
"Welcome to the My KBiP application. This application consists of 3 sections: Schedule, Gradebook and Profile. 

 Schedule - Displays your group's class schedule. On first launch, you will be prompted to select your group from the list. On subsequent launches, the schedule will be loaded automatically. 

Gradebook - shows your grades in the academic disciplines. To access them, enter your personal data in the Profile section. Logging in is automatic. 

Profile - in this section you can change the data that will be used to log into the gradebook."
Unstable connection. The page will load from the cache.
